Description

Release details

Tracklist

With his beautifully refined guitar fingerpicking style and gentle voice, Mississippi John Hurt had a truly unique interpretation of the blues which was rooted in the bygone songster and ragtime traditions. Leaving behind a legacy of great songs, these beautifully remastered 1928 recordings show why he influenced many great musicians during the folk-revival including Bob Dylan, Dave Van Ronk and Taj Mahal.

Artist: Mississippi John Hurt

Label: World Music Network

Format: LP

Units: 1

Country: Europe

Genre: Blues
